card.name: Leangarung, the Mist's Teeth
card.text: ({T}: Add {R} or {W}.) Leangarung, the Mist's Teeth enters the battlefield tapped. {RW}{RW}{RW}{RW}{RW}, {T}, Exile Leangarung: Untap target creature you control. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase. Only one creature may attack during that phase. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Lieve, Pale Rider
card.text: [+1]: Discard a card, then draw a card. [-2]: Put two -1/-1 counters on target creature. [-4]: Create a black Race battle token with 5 starting defense and "When this battle is defeated, each opponent loses 9 life."

card.name: Lord of the Outback
card.text: Whenever Lord of the Outback deals combat damage to a player or battle, draw a card, then you may put any number of permanent cards from your hand onto the battlefield. Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Thunderstriker
card.text: When Thunderstriker enters the battlefield or attacks, it deals 2 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead. Thunderstriker gets +1/+1 for each card exiled with it. Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.text: If a source you control would deal damage to an opponent, a permanent an opponent controls, or a permanent an opponent protects, it deals that much damage plus 1 instead.

card.name: Ute Muster
card.text: Whenever a Vehicle enters the battlefield under your control, put a rev counter on Ute Muster. Attacking Vehicles you control get +1/+0 for each rev counter on Ute Muster.

card.name: Joyride

card.name: Draft Archetypes SMK
card.text: {W}{U} ARTIFACTS Gizmos and rustbuckets, a right proper kludge. {U}{B} SMUGGLE Move counters around for fun and profit. {B}{R} BATTLES Run a good race—Just not necessarily a fair one. {R}{G} JURY RIG Your expendable artifact creatures can come back again as vehicles. {G}{W} VEHICLES Artifact creatures and regular Vehicles are both bonzer here. {W}{B} WITHER Win a war of attrition by grinding down the enemy's creatures. {B}{G} -1/-1 COUNTERS You're bigger than them. Especially if you cut their knees out. {G}{U} MUTANTS Those oddboys aren't so bad when they travel in packs. {U}{R} VEHICLES Hit hard and hit fast and hit them with a big greasy ute. {R}{W} RACES Hit battles quickly, or drive Vehicles, your summoning sick creatures will always have something to do.
